alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 8:29PM CDT until April 15 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Union County in south central Arkansas... Northwestern Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Northeastern Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 828 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Junction City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Huttig, Junction City, Strong, Urbana, Lawson, Wesson, Lapile, Felsenthal, Spearsville, Lillie, Hew Hope, Newell, New London, Antioch, Aurelle, Taylorville, Summerfield, Hillsboro and Three Creeks. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
